thread.section_title: Washington Post: Breaking News, World, US, DC News & Analysis
thread.title: Trump’s fuzzy math on undocumented immigrants convicted of crimes
thread.title_full: Trump’s fuzzy math on undocumented immigrants convicted of crimes - The Washington Post

author: Seever90
text: Obama Releases Another 40,000 Illegal Aliens with Violent Criminal Records Inside the U.S.!nnBesides implementing a flagrant amnesty plan that defies Congress and the rule of law, the Obama administration freed tens of thousands of illegal immigrants convicted of violent and serious crimes last year, according to the governmentu2019s own records.nnThe crimes committed by illegal aliens released from federal custody include homicide, sexual assault, theft, kidnapping and alcohol-related driving convictions. In all, Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) freed 36,007 aliens convicted of 88,000 crimes from detention centers throughout the United States, according the breathtaking agency records.n nICE records reveal that the 36,007 convicted criminal aliens freed from ICE custody in many instances had multiple convictions. Among them, the 36,007 had nearly 88,000 convictions, including:nnu2022t193 homicide convictions (including one willful killing of a public official with gunnu2022t426 sexual assault convictionsnu2022t303 kidnapping convictionsnu2022t1,075 aggravated assault convictionsnu2022t1,160 stolen vehicle convictionsnu2022t9,187 dangerous drug convictionsnu2022t16,070 drunk or drugged driving convictionsnu2022t303 flight escape convictions nnhttp://www.cbsnews.com/news/report-36k-criminals-freed-while-awaiting-deportation/n
